damaging_admission.purpose: Build trust by limiting the promise to what is true.

space_doctrine.grid: Use ma_breath for micro spacing, ma_rest for sections, ma_void for pauses.

typographic_posture.hierarchy: Display for headlines, body for narrative, mono for specs.
typographic_posture.weights: Regular for body, semibold for headings.

chroma_discipline.palette: Washi background, sumi text, persimmon accent.

motion_doctrine.rule: Motion must signal thresholds, not decorate.

slippery_slide_checklist: Every headline earns the next line.
Each paragraph ends with a question or implication.
CTAs appear only after relief is established.

derivation_log.axiom: Attention is sacred. Every demand on consciousness must be earned.

chain.decision: Set voice to calm, precise, and non-hyped.
chain.rationale: Trust is built through restraint and clarity.
Copy must honor the same thresholds as motion.
